thread.title: Hollywood Benghazi film sparking anger inside Libya
thread.title_full: Hollywood Benghazi film sparking anger inside Libya

title: Hollywood Benghazi film sparking anger inside Libya
text:
Hollywood Benghazi film sparking ange... Hollywood Benghazi film sparking anger inside Libya There are 3 comments on the CBS News story from 15 hrs ago, titled Hollywood Benghazi film sparking anger inside Libya . In it, CBS News reports that: 
Even before the film's release, Hollywood director Michael Bay's new action movie is stirring controversy among government officials and residents of Benghazi, Libya's second-largest city and the birthplace of the uprising against longtime dictator Muammar Qaddafi. The film, "13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi," depicts the events of the September 2012 attack on the U.S. consulate that killed four Americans, including Ambassador J. Christopher Stevens. Join the discussion below, or Read more at CBS News.
